room.name: the entrance room
room.short_description: This is the entrance room of the house
room.long_description: The entrance room is filled with shoes, jackets, and personal belongings.

room.name: the game room
room.long_description: An average room that has lots of video games, card games, and a ping pong table.

room.name: the gym room
room.long_description: The gym has a lot of exercising equipment. There are some treadmills, and dumbbells. It has lot of smelly towels.

room.name: the music room
room.short_description: the muscial room of the house
room.long_description: A large room where it has a lot of musical instruments. The peaceful piano music is always playing in the darkness.

room.name: the swimming pool room
room.long_description: The water of the swimming pool is really clear,and the water is always splashing.

room.name: the theater room
room.long_description: The movie theater is always very loud. Comedies and actions are always playing on screen. The smell of the popcorn always make the room smell so good.

item.name: music tuner
item.desc: a music tuner is inside a old trumpet box

item.name: cards
item.desc: one of the deck of playing cards was used by Penn and Teller is inside a drawer

item.name: whistle
item.desc: a lifeguard whistle is in the water somewhere

item.name: protein powder
item.desc: a bag of protein powder is under the bench press set

item.name: remote
item.desc: the projection screen's remote it somewhere under the seat
